Title: Long in the Tooth
Plot: Raylan leaves to California to follow the trails of a criminal who has evaded him twice in the past, and Raylan is determined that the third time won't be the same.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Alan Ruck, Michele Nordin, Lance Barber, Brian Goodman, Brandon Keener, David Warshofsky, Clarence Williams III
